mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_detail ( product_id, cert_no, product_name, expiry_date, approval_date, how_to_take, main_function, precautions, storage_method, standard, ingredients ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{certNo}, #{productName}, #{expiryDate}, #{approvalDate}, #{howToTake}, #{mainFunction}, #{precautions}, #{storageMethod}, #{standard}, #{ingredients} )
mapper.select: SELECT product_id AS productId, cert_no AS certNo, product_name AS productName, expiry_date AS expiryDate, approval_date AS approvalDate, how_to_take AS howToTake, main_function AS mainFunction, precautions, storage_method AS storageMethod, standard, ingredients FROM product_detail WHERE product_id = #{productId}

SELECT d.product_id AS productId, d.cert_no AS certNo, d.product_name AS productName, d.expiry_date AS expiryDate, d.approval_date AS approvalDate, d.how_to_take AS howToTake, d.main_function AS mainFunction, d.precautions, d.storage_method AS storageMethod, d.standard, d.ingredients, p.status AS status FROM product_detail d JOIN product p ON d.product_id = p.product_id WHERE d.cert_no = #{certNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE product_detail SET product_name = #{productName}, expiry_date = #{expiryDate}, approval_date = #{approvalDate}, how_to_take = #{howToTake}, main_function = #{mainFunction}, precautions = #{precautions}, storage_method = #{storageMethod}, standard = #{standard}, ingredients = #{ingredients} WHERE product_id = #{productId}
